hints.index: This is a country-specific homepage, which contains a selection of products managed on Shopify. Each product has more variants (sizes) that are connected to different SKUs on Commerce Layer. Prices for the first available variants are fetched from Commerce Layer. The selected country (market) determines the current price list and currency. Select a product to view all the available variants and their availability details.
hints.product: This is a product page. All content is managed on Shopify. When you select a size, the price and availability information are fetched from Commerce Layer. If the selected variant is available, you can add it to the shopping cart.
